[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout_interface.md)

## IFlyout interface

Interface for a flyout.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IFlyout extends IRegistrable 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [IRegistrable](./blockly.iregistrable_interface.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoClose](./blockly.iflyout_interface.autoclose_propertysignature.md) |  | boolean | Does the flyout automatically close when a block is created? |
|  [CORNER\_RADIUS](./blockly.iflyout_interface.corner_radius_propertysignature.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Corner radius of the flyout background. |
|  [horizontalLayout](./blockly.iflyout_interface.horizontallayout_propertysignature.md) |  | boolean | Whether the flyout is laid out horizontally or not. |
|  [MARGIN](./blockly.iflyout_interface.margin_propertysignature.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Margin around the edges of the blocks in the flyout. |
|  [RTL](./blockly.iflyout_interface.rtl_propertysignature.md) |  | boolean | Is RTL vs LTR. |
|  [targetWorkspace](./blockly.iflyout_interface.targetworkspace_propertysignature.md) |  | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) \| null | The target workspace |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createBlock(originalBlock)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.createblock_1_methodsignature.md) | Create a copy of this block on the workspace. |
|  [createDom(tagName)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.createdom_1_methodsignature.md) | Creates the flyout's DOM. Only needs to be called once. The flyout can either exist as its own svg element or be a g element nested inside a separate svg element. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.dispose_1_methodsignature.md) | Dispose of this flyout. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks. |
|  [getHeight()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getheight_1_methodsignature.md) | Get the height of the flyout. |
|  [getWidth()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getwidth_1_methodsignature.md) | Get the width of the flyout. |
|  [getWorkspace()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getworkspace_1_methodsignature.md) | Get the workspace inside the flyout. |
|  [getX()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getx_1_methodsignature.md) | Calculates the x coordinate for the flyout position. |
|  [getY()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.gety_1_methodsignature.md) | Calculates the y coordinate for the flyout position. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.hide_1_methodsignature.md) | Hide and empty the flyout. |
|  [init(targetWorkspace)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.init_1_methodsignature.md) | Initializes the flyout. |
|  [isBlockCreatable(block)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.isblockcreatable_1_methodsignature.md) | Does this flyout allow you to create a new instance of the given block? Used for deciding if a block can be "dragged out of" the flyout. |
|  [isDragTowardWorkspace(currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.isdragtowardworkspace_1_methodsignature.md) | Determine if a drag delta is toward the workspace, based on the position and orientation of the flyout. This is used in determineDragIntention\_ to determine if a new block should be created or if the flyout should scroll. |
|  [isScrollable()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.isscrollable_1_methodsignature.md) |  |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.isvisible_1_methodsignature.md) | Is the flyout visible? |
|  [position()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.position_1_methodsignature.md) | Position the flyout. |
|  [reflow()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.reflow_1_methodsignature.md) | Reflow blocks and their mats. |
|  [scrollToStart()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.scrolltostart_1_methodsignature.md) | Scroll the flyout to the beginning of its contents. |
|  [setContainerVisible(visible)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.setcontainervisible_1_methodsignature.md) | Set whether this flyout's container is visible. |
|  [setVisible(visible)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.setvisible_1_methodsignature.md) | Set whether the flyout is visible. A value of true does not necessarily mean that the flyout is shown. It could be hidden because its container is hidden. |
|  [show(flyoutDef)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.show_1_methodsignature.md) | Show and populate the flyout. |
